description: Sweet potato french fries will surprise everyone at your holiday table — and nobody will miss the marshmallows The potatoes are baked, not fried, so no need to feel guilty Chili powder, cumin, cayenne and paprika complement the natural sweetness of the potatoes
title: Spiced Sweet Potato Fries With Chili-Cilantro Cream
title_page: Spiced Sweet Potato Fries With Chili-Cilantro Cream Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Sweet potato french fries will surprise everyone at your holiday table — and nobody will miss the marshmallows. The potatoes are baked, not fried, so no need to feel guilty. Chili powder, cumin, cayenne and paprika complement the natural sweetness of the potatoes. It’s probably a good idea to double this recipe, because they go fast.
Featured in: Home Cooks Rethink Sweet Potatoes.
